sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker"> <x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <date_of_declaration>2021-03-12</date_of_declaration> <defaulter_members>REFLECTION INVESTMENTS</defaulter_members> <directors_partners>VIJAY SAMBRANI CHANDRIKA SAMBRANI</directors_partners> <number>DEF0001010</number> <reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter>1) Shortfall in client funds 2) Shortfall in net worth 3) Â Falsification of lnformation and misrepresentation of data submitted to the Exchange 4) Failure to resolve investor complaints and non-fufillment of Grievance Redressal Committee (GRC) order 5) Failure to comply with the directions of the Member & Core Settlement Guarantee Fund Committee (MCSGFC)</reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>76b164bb2f71091051dad5f62799b660</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_updated_on> </x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker> </record_update>
